import Tabs from "@theme/Tabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

## ESLint

- https://eslint.org/docs/latest/use/getting-started

<Tabs
	groupId="jsPackageManager"
	defaultValue="yarn"
	values={[
		{label: 'Yarn', value: 'yarn',},
		{label: 'npm', value: 'npm',},
	]}
>

<TabItem value="yarn">

```shell
yarn create @eslint/config@latest
```

</TabItem>

<TabItem value="npm">

```shell
npm init @eslint/config@latest
```

</TabItem>

</Tabs>

### Prettier

- https://github.com/prettier/eslint-config-prettier?tab=readme-ov-file#installation

<Tabs
	groupId="jsPackageManager"
	defaultValue="yarn"
	values={[
		{label: 'Yarn', value: 'yarn',},
		{label: 'npm', value: 'npm',},
	]}
>

<TabItem value="yarn">

```shell
yarn add -D eslint-config-prettier
```

</TabItem>

<TabItem value="npm">

```shell
npm install -D eslint-config-prettier
```

</TabItem>

</Tabs>

```javascript title="eslint.config.mjs"
import eslintConfigPrettier from "eslint-config-prettier";

export default [
	// ...
	eslintConfigPrettier,
];
```

### Typescript

- https://typescript-eslint.io/getting-started

<Tabs
	groupId="jsPackageManager"
	defaultValue="yarn"
	values={[
		{label: 'Yarn', value: 'yarn',},
		{label: 'npm', value: 'npm',},
	]}
>

<TabItem value="yarn">

```shell
yarn add -D typescript-eslint
```

</TabItem>

<TabItem value="npm">

```shell
npm install -D typescript-eslint
```

</TabItem>

</Tabs>

```javascript title="eslint.config.mjs"
import eslint from "@eslint/js";
import tseslint from "typescript-eslint";

export default tseslint.config(eslint.configs.recommended, ...tseslint.configs.recommended);
```

## Prettier

<Tabs
	groupId="jsPackageManager"
	defaultValue="yarn"
	values={[
		{label: 'Yarn', value: 'yarn',},
		{label: 'npm', value: 'npm',},
	]}
>

<TabItem value="yarn">

```shell
yarn add -D prettier
```

</TabItem>

<TabItem value="npm">

```shell
npm install -D prettier
```

</TabItem>

</Tabs>

- https://prettier.io/docs/en/configuration.html

```javascript title="prettier.config.mjs"
export default {
	printWidth: 120,
	singleQuote: false,
	trailingComma: "all",
	useTabs: true,
};
```

```ignore title=".prettierignore"
### macOS ###
# General
.DS_Store

### JavaScript ###
# Dependencies
node_modules
pnpm-lock.yaml
package-lock.json
yarn.lock

# Build
dist
build
```

```shell
prettier --write .
```

### TailwindCSS

- https://github.com/tailwindlabs/prettier-plugin-tailwindcss

<Tabs
	groupId="jsPackageManager"
	defaultValue="yarn"
	values={[
		{label: 'Yarn', value: 'yarn',},
		{label: 'npm', value: 'npm',},
	]}
>

<TabItem value="yarn">

```shell
yarn add -D prettier-plugin-tailwindcss
```

</TabItem>

<TabItem value="npm">

```shell
npm install -D prettier-plugin-tailwindcss
```

</TabItem>

</Tabs>

```javascript title="prettier.config.mjs"
export default {
	plugins: [
		"prettier-plugin-tailwindcss", // 다른 플러그인과 호환성을 위해 마지막에 추가
	],
	tailwindFunctions: ["clsx"],
};
```
